name: Attitude Aviation Uganda
about: Attitude Aviation Uganda, an IATA Authorized Training Center, is dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training in Uganda. Led by CEO and Accountable Manager Andrew Kifudde, the school focuses on cultivating skilled and passionate aviation professionals. Our training programs include comprehensive courses in flight operations, dispatch, airport operations, and customer service, all aligned with international standards. With a strong emphasis on safety and excellence, we equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary to succeed in the aviation industry. Our commitment to quality education and practical training ensures that our graduates are well-prepared for their careers in aviation. At Attitude Aviation Uganda, we strive to be a leading provider of aviation training in the region.
